p.k: The reef systems on Africa's southern coastline, which are home to a wide range of marine creatures who must compete with each other to survive
Killer Whale Vs Shark . The amazing hunting instincts and evasion tactics employed by animals in the wild
Experts enter some of the most shark-infested waters in the world to investigate first-hand how the creatures attack
Rare footage of sharks being attacked and eaten by other animals, revealing the circumstances in which a powerful predator can slide down the food chain
The team members turn their attention to tiger sharks, hoping to use their new-found techniques to pull one on board the boat
The team puts new tactics to the test in the search for hammerhead sharks, and tries to uncover the mysteries of migration to the Revillagigedo Islands
Zeb Hogan goes in search of whale sharks, the biggest fish in the world, in Mexico's Sea of Cortez, and discovers why they are drawn to shallow water in the spring
Footage of sharks hunting tuna, revealing the tactics used to catch fish that are much larger and faster than they are and the rivals they have to outwit
Documentary exploring shark feeding behaviour in 10 locations around the world, revealing how the special conditions of their hunting grounds affects the search for food
Experts Dr Craig O'Connell and Dr Geremy Cliff look beneath the skin of the sharks, to uncover the source of their unique predatory qualities
One of the biggest feeding frenzies on Earth, as countless sharks and other predators dine on millions of sardines as the tiny fish migrate
Sharks . An insight into the development of sharks from ancient predators into one of the planet's weirdest and most diverse groups of creatures
A series of shark attacks that occurred in San Francisco in 2004, including the first fatality in more than 40 years
Scientists analyse evidence of sharks attacking each other, and investigate the environmental factors that might drive the aquatic predators to turn on their own kind
The inventor of a wetsuit designed to protect the wearer from shark bites puts his creation to the test by encouraging a deadly tiger shark to attack him
The feeding activities of a female great white shark that inhabits the waters off the coast of South Africa's False Bay. Alec Baldwin narrates
Documentary uncovering revelations made by marine biologists as they explore the development and behaviour of the ocean creatures
A look at a series of incidents in the tourist destination of Cape Cod, when 600 sharks were sighted and four people were attacked
The Bahamas is home to 40 species of shark, but attacks on humans are rare. However, in 2002, a spate of incidents occurred that left 36 people maimed or killed
